article.description: Joseph Uchebo scored 21 points and grabbed nine rebounds as Charlotte rolled to 92-72 win over North Carolina A&T on Wednesday night.
article.headline: Charlotte rolls to 92-72 win over North Carolina A&T
article.linkText: Charlotte rolls to 92-72 win over North Carolina A&T
article.story: GREENSBORO, N.C. -- Joseph Uchebo scored 21 points and grabbed nine rebounds as Charlotte rolled to 92-72 win over North Carolina A&T on Wednesday night. Uchebo was 9 of 10 from the field for the 49ers (8-14). Anthony Vanhook added 13 points, three rebounds and seven assists, and Braxton Ogbueze and Jon Davis each had 12 points, three rebounds and five assists. Charlotte took an early lead and had a 45-27 advantage at the break. In the second half, the 49ers outscored North Carolina A&T 47-45 and rolled to the win. The 49ers were 55.7 percent from the field, 81.3 percent from the line and 44 percent (11 of 25) from beyond the 3-point arc. Sam Hunt scored 21 points for the Aggies (6-18), who were 44 percent from the field and 73.3 percent from the line.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
